name: Oro's Quest (creepingdom)
description:
Oro's Quest 

Oro navigates through various areas to stop the rise of an evil king. Oro will jump and blast through colorful groves, dark caves, frozen lands and maybe even somewhere he isn't supposed to be...

Team up!

There's strength in numbers! Anytime during Oro's Quest he can split into another body! The coloration may be a bit odd... but help is help! Now all he needs is a little help controlling his "friend."

Collectables!

Now who has the time to set out a bunch of big floating coins? Maybe the same person who leaves behind floating candy and power ups? Who cares! The coins are shiny and anyone willing to collect them all is sure to be rewarded greatly!

(GAMEPAD SUPPORTED)

THIS DEMO ONLY CONTAINS 1 WORLD
